scripts.docker:dev:build: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache server && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.docker:dev:rebuild: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache --pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.docker:dev:client:rebuild: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml restart server
scripts.docker:prod:build: docker compose build --no-cache server && docker compose up -d
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache --pull && docker compose up -d
